trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event is raised by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> method just before adding a control to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>evento viene generato dal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A>metodo appena prima di aggiungere un controllo a una zona Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartAdding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento fornisce la possibilità di annullare il processo prima del completamento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event is called after a control has been added to a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>eventi viene chiamato dopo l'aggiunta di un controllo a una zona Web part.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartAddingEventArgs class contains information that can be used within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding> event.
trans-unit.target: La classe WebPartAddingEventArgs contiene informazioni che possono essere utilizzate all'interno di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdding>

trans-unit.source: It provides access to the Web Parts control that is being added and the zone it is being added to.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso di controlli Web part che viene aggiunto e aggiungerlo alla zona.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartAddingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or server or user control) to be added to a Web page or opened on a page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> (o control server o utente) da aggiungere a una pagina Web o aperto in una pagina.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that `webPart` is being added to.
An integer that represents the ordinal position that `webPart` occupies in `zone`, relative to other controls in `zone`.
trans-unit.target: Posizione di un intero che rappresenta il numero ordinale che `webPart` occupa `zone`, rispetto agli altri controlli in `zone`.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Web Parts zone that the Web Parts control is being added to.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la zona Web part che viene aggiunto per il controllo di Web part.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that the Web Parts control is being added to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> che viene aggiunto per il controllo di Web part.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index position of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la posizione di indice di un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controllo all'interno dell'area.

trans-unit.source: The ZoneIndex property indicates the numerical order (or ordinal position) within the zone for the Web Parts control being added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà ZoneIndex indica l'ordine numerico (o la posizione ordinale) all'interno della zona per il controllo di Web part aggiunta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>eventi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses this property to track and manage its collection of Web Parts controls on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>controllo utilizza questa proprietà per tenere traccia e gestire l'insieme di controlli Web part in una pagina Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The value of the ZoneIndex property for a control might not equal the index value for the same control within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Il valore della proprietà ZoneIndex per un controllo non può essere uguale il valore di indice del controllo stesso all'interno di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The numerical order of a control within its zone.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine numerico di un controllo all'interno della zona.

trans-unit.source: The first control in a zone has an index value of zero.
trans-unit.target: Il primo controllo in una zona ha un valore di indice pari a zero.
